rooms.description: Spacious living area with a view of the garden and natural light from north-facing windows.
Modern kitchen with west-facing window for ventilation and natural lighting.
Master bedroom with a spacious balcony on the west side for fresh air. Vastu compliant entrance aligning with energy flow.
Second bedroom featuring a spacious balcony for relaxation and privacy. Vastu principles considered in placement.
Bathroom placed away from the main living area to maintain privacy.

openings.description: Primary entry with a welcoming archway and natural lighting.
Service entrance for utilities and storage access.
